mapper.select: WITH fen AS ( SELECT kmdm, kmmc, to_char( nvl( sum( CASE WHEN lx = '区县级' THEN fse END ), 0 ), 'fm99999999999990.00' ) qxshuie, to_char( nvl( sum( CASE WHEN lx = '省级' THEN fse END ), 0 ), 'fm99999999999990.00' ) shengshuie, to_char( nvl( sum( CASE WHEN lx = '市级' THEN fse END ), 0 ), 'fm99999999999990.00' ) shishuie, to_char( nvl( sum( CASE WHEN lx = '中央级' THEN fse END ), 0 ), 'fm99999999999990.00' ) zyshuie FROM VM_JKBB WHERE 1 = 1 AND substr(sj,0,10)>=#{cxrqq} AND substr(sj,0,10)<=#{cxrqz} GROUP BY kmdm, kmmc ) SELECT * FROM ( SELECT kmdm, kmmc, qxshuie, shengshuie, shishuie, zyshuie FROM fen ) UNION ALL SELECT '' kmdm, '合计' kmmc, to_char( nvl( sum( CASE WHEN lx = '区县级' THEN fse END ), 0 ), 'fm99999999999990.00' ) qxshuie, to_char( nvl( sum( CASE WHEN lx = '省级' THEN fse END ), 0 ), 'fm99999999999990.00' ) shengshuie, to_char( nvl( sum( CASE WHEN lx = '市级' THEN fse END ), 0 ), 'fm99999999999990.00' ) shishuie, to_char( nvl( sum( CASE WHEN lx = '中央级' THEN fse END ), 0 ), 'fm99999999999990.00' ) zyshuie FROM VM_JKBB WHERE 1 = 1 AND substr(sj,0,10)>=#{cxrqq} AND substr(sj,0,10)<=#{cxrqz} AND substr( kmdm, 0, 5 ) IN ( SELECT kmdm FROM VM_JKBB WHERE length( kmdm ) = 5 GROUP BY kmdm UNION ALL SELECT '10399' FROM dual ) AND length( kmdm ) >5
